channel.title: Why cant i host my server anymore?
channel.description: ok this is really annoying me. I followed the steps to creating my own server and for a peroid of time i was able to host my own server. in the proccess of creating my server i noticed some unusual things happened in my server like character files not being saved. i asked my friend to see if he could he on to my server and all of a sudden he couldn't when he used to before. i tried switching through different types of sources but it didnt fix anything. my fire walls are no even on so they wouldnt be blocking it. The only thing i can think of is the fact that i port forwarded wrong, but that makes me think why was it working before then. plz i need help about this matter and i dont know what to do anymore. I just switched routers but the problems started happened before my router got switched out. thank you for whoever answer this or who at least tries to !!

item.title: Why cant i host my server anymore?
item.dc:creator: @Mike_101994 Mike 101994
item.description:
@Mike_101994 wrote:

um actualy i port forwarded with my new router but im not sure if i did it right =/ the instruction on portforward.com helped me but some information i needed was missing so i only assumed things when port forwarding. but remember before i got the new router problems started to occur! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2008, 08:55:29 pm[/size][hr]but ill will try port forwarding again and ill see if it helps =/ weird huh?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2008, 09:38:49 pm[/size][hr]if anyone else comes up with a suggestion, anything please post it! I going crazy :eek:

Read full topic
item.source: Why cant i host my server anymore?

item.title: Why cant i host my server anymore?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Did you port forward with your new router? if you did and its still not working try burning your router. it fixed my problem

Read full topic
